description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4.17m in depth, maximum height of 3.30m, and eaves height of 3m)
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule  2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Condition 9 (Car Park Management Plan) - RBK Neighbourhood Engineer has reviewed the information submitted and is satisfied this can now be approved.

Please excuse that this was not picked up earlier however as the proposed development is within flood zones 2 and 3 or on a site of more than 1ha, you are required to provide a Flood Risk Assessment before the application can be assessed.  For further information and guidance on any aspects of undertaking a Flood Risk Assessment please contact the Environment Agency by visiting their website at http://planningguidance.communities.gov.uk/blog/guidance/flood-risk-and-coastal-change/site-specific-flood-risk-assessment-checklist/
